alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Conway; Stone; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 31 at 1:27PM CDT until March 31 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Stone County in north central Arkansas... Eastern Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... West central Cleburne County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Conway County in central Arkansas... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 126 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Claude, or 10 miles southwest of Clinton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Greers Ferry... Shirley... Higden... Fairfield Bay Marina... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... Claude... Choctaw... Bee Branch... Austin in Conway County... Edgemont... Culpepper... Formosa... South Fork Recreation Area... Narrows Marina... Choctow Recreation Area... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
